channel.title: Wilderness Teleporting...Help! :(
channel.description:
Ok,well i love my server,because its pking is like real runescape (Good memorys) only 1 problem,people can just teleport out of wild during battle,i know thats what teleblock is for,BUT i'm lazy and don't feel like teleblocking,i was wondering if anyone knew how to make it where people can't teleport in wild even if there not teleblocked,any help would be greatly appericated,please post a code on how to do it,if your going to tell me how.
Thanks
~Cody

item.title: Wilderness Teleporting...Help! :(
item.dc:creator: @Call_of_Duty Call of Duty
item.description:
@Call_of_Duty wrote:

[quote=“deathbadger, post:1, topic:196066”]Ok,well i love my server,because its pking is like real runescape (Good memorys) only 1 problem,people can just teleport out of wild during battle,i know thats what teleblock is for,BUT i’m lazy and don’t feel like teleblocking,i was wondering if anyone knew how to make it where people can’t teleport in wild even if there not teleblocked,any help would be greatly appericated,please post a code on how to do it,if your going to tell me how.

Thanks

~Cody[/quote]When they try to teleport, make an } else { statement that if they’re in the wilderness, they’ll be denied and sent a message.

Read full topic

item.title: Wilderness Teleporting...Help! :(

item.description:
@o_b_b_y_k_o wrote:

if you want it realistic like rs, make it not past level 20.
